description:
Fast and effective C++ file optimizer.


Release 0.9.5 includes several bug fixes.
Notably, a rare infinite loop during deflate-based compression was fixed that could occur when compressing data with long runs of repeated bytes. Users are strongly encouraged to upgrade.Bugs fixed
